definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: In comparison, the Earth orbits at just 1 AU.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，地球軌道只是一個天文單位。

sentences.english: The distance from the sun to earth is one astronomical unit.
sentences.chinese: 太陽到地球的距離即爲一個天文單位。

sentences.english: One AU is the distance from the sun to the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 一個天文單位就是地球到太陽的距離。

sentences.english: It could be found up to 30, 000 astronomical units from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 它可能會在距離太陽3萬個天文單位的地方被發現。

sentences.english: One astronomical unit equals the distance from the earth to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 一天文單位等於從地球到太陽的距離。

sentences.english: One astronomical unit is the distance between the Earth and the sun.
sentences.chinese: 一個天文單位等於地球到太陽之間的距離。

sentences.english: An astronomical unit is the distance between Earth and our sun.
sentences.chinese: 一個天文單位是地球與太陽之間的距離。
